pronunciation.pinyin: wàn wéi tiān luó dì wǎng
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: Wan4 wei2 Tian1 luo2 Di4 wang3

meanings.value: ten-thousand dimensional net covering heaven and earth
term coined by China News Digest and abbr. to 萬維網|万维网[Wan4 wei2 wang3]
meanings.traditional: erm coined by China News Digest and abbr. to 萬維網|万维网
